titleStmt.title: Blacklo's Cabal discovered in severall of their letters clearly expressing designs inhumane against regulars, vniust against the laity, scismatical aganist [sic] the Pope, cruel against Orthodox clergy men and ovvning the nullity of the chapter, their opposition of Episcopall authority / published by R. Pugh ...
titleStmt.author: Pugh, Robert, 1609-1679.

titleStmt.title: Blacklo's Cabal discovered in severall of their letters clearly expressing designs inhumane against regulars, vniust against the laity, scismatical aganist [sic] the Pope, cruel against Orthodox clergy men and ovvning the nullity of the chapter, their opposition of Episcopall authority / published by R. editionStmt.edition: The second edition enlarged in some fevv notes.

notesStmt.note: Thomas White of Essex was commonly known as Blacklo. Cf. Pref.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
